_source.short_desc: Kixie is the sales engagement platform that boosts sales team performance with ultra-reliable, easily-automated calling & texting.
_source.long_desc: Better Sales, Made Simple. Kixie is the sales engagement platform that boosts sales team performance with ultra-reliable, easily-automated calling and texting for Hubspot, SalesForce, Zoho, Pipedrive, and leading CRMs. Supercharge your CRM into an automated sales machine with intelligent autodialing, seamless CRM integration, and Enterprise phone service. Start making calls in 3 minutes with no hardware and a 100% free trial.
_source.pricing_details:
Integrated: $35.00 per month.
Professional: $65.00 per month
Outbound PowerDialer: $95.00 per month
 
Contact Kixie for more detailed pricing, or visit www.kixie.com/pricing/
_source.target_audience: CRM users, Account Executives, SDR/BDRs, Inside sales teams, Enterprise sales teams, sales managers, sales reps

category_features.name: Power Dialer
category_features.definition: System automatically dials the next number on the contact list after the previous call ends

category_features.name: Predictive Dialer
category_features.definition: System calls multiple numbers at once and connects the agent to the first number that answers

category_features.definition: System provides callee information to agent prior to the call to help determine whether or not to make the call

category_features.name: Progressive Dialer
category_features.definition: System makes individual calls from a list as soon as the agent is available

related_products.short_desc: GoToConnect combines Jive's VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's video conferencing into one simple, reliable and flexible solution.
related_products.features: GoToConnect (formerly Jive) combines cloud VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's web, audio and video capabilities into one simple, flexible solution. Users can meet, talk, and collaborate via web browser, desktop application, or desk phone with features ranging from virtual voicemail, and call forwarding, to secure video conferencing and screen sharing. For as low as $19.95 a month, GoToConnect eliminates the hassle and expense of managing multiple collaboration solution providers.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud contact center software that offers VR, skills-based routing, AI, call blending, and analytics.
related_products.features: NICE CXone Personal Connection is a patented dialer that generates more revenue and reduces hang-ups. As an Auto Dialer, it automates the process of making calls from an outbound contact center. CXone Personal Connection natively supports the following dialing modes: predictive (power), progressive, preview and agentless.?

related_products.short_desc: Gong enables revenue teams to realize their fullest potential by unveiling their customer reality.
related_products.features:
Gong enables revenue teams to realize their fullest potential by unveiling their customer reality. 

The patented Gong Revenue Intelligence Platform captures and understands every customer interaction, then delivers insights at scale, empowering revenue teams to make decisions based on data instead of opinions. 

Over 2,000 innovative companies like Paychex, PayPal, Hubspot, LinkedIn, MuleSoft, Shopify, Slack, SproutSocial, Twilio, and Zillow trust Gong to power their customer reality.

related_products.short_desc: Dialpad modernizes communication technology, putting voice, messaging, meetings, and video on any device.
related_products.features: Dialpad Sell is an effective sales dialer for sales organizations of any size. Dialpad Sell offers multiple real-time and post-call sales coaching features that drive efficiency. With features like Real-Time Recommendations, answers to common prospect questions pop up when specific keywords are mentioned during an active call. Direct integrations with other essential tools like Salesforce, G Suite and more means accurate activity logging, whether your reps are at their desks or out in the field.

related_products.short_desc: Agile CRM is a complete sales, marketing and service suite designed to let SMBs to sell and market like the Fortune 500.
related_products.features: Agile CRM Auto-dialer software helps Automate, streamline and manage your telephone outreach. Take customer interaction to the next level with Agile CRM's industry-leading power dialer feature. Select multiple contacts and dial them one-by-one, either automatically or manually.

related_products.short_desc: Five9 Cloud Contact Center - Predictive, Power, Progressive and Preview Dialers, Inbound, Chat, Call Recording, and CRM integrations.
related_products.features: Triple your live phone connections with Five9's Auto Dialer that outperforms other dialers available today. Intelligent algorithms ensure the next caller is available when the next agent is ready. Automate the dialing process, skip no-answers and busy signals, and spend more time talking to live leads, with easily adjustable dialing modes. Manage your lists and campaigns, monitor calls, report in real-time, coach agents and comply with TCPA. See why Five9 is the industry leader.

related_products.short_desc: Twilio provides simple, pay-as-you-go APIs for businesses to build scalable, reliable voice and SMS apps for the web or mobile devices.
related_products.features: Twilio is the worlds leading cloud communication platform that enables you to engage customers across channels - SMS, voice, video, email, WhatsApp and more. Pay-as-you-go APIs allow businesses to scale communications reliably.

related_products.short_desc: Dial more prospects and close deals faster with better quality calls that give your sales reps the upper hand.
related_products.features: Dial more prospects and close deals faster with better quality calls that give your sales reps the upper hand. Aircall's flexible sales dialer solution enables reps to dial multiple prospects automatically in a back-to-back queue, while surfacing crucial contact information directly in the phone interface. Join 6,000+ companies that trust Aircall to strengthen their sales outreach with first-class phone features like: CRM integrations, CTI, call coaching, call tagging, click-to-dial, and more.

related_products.short_desc: EngageBay is a simple, affordable all-in-one marketing, sales and service CRM software to acquire, engage, nurture, close leads.
related_products.features: EngageBay is a simple, affordable, all-in-one marketing, sales and service CRM software built for small businesses and startups to acquire, engage, nurture web visitors and convert them to happy customers. Acquire leads through lead generation forms and popups, engage web visitors through beautiful landing pages, nurture them through engaging emails, and automate your marketing funnel through marketing automation - all from one easy to use platform.

related_products.short_desc: Open source call center software w/ outbound predictive dialer. Also handles inbound & manual calls as well as email and web chat.
related_products.features: Open source contact center software with predictive dialer capabilities. Handles inbound, outbound, and blended phone calls, as well as inbound email and customer website chat.

related_products.short_desc: CloudTalk is a cloud-based phone system for support and sales teams. We make calling easy and fun! Get your FREE trial today!
related_products.features: CloudTalk's powerful auto-dialing software will have your agents handling more calls in less time. Over 2,500 companies - including DHL, Yves Rocher and Glovo - rely on CloudTalk for its superior call-quality and auto-dialing functionality. Make things easier for your sales and customer support teams with 70+ time-saving features and easy-to-setup integrations with your existing Helpdesk, CRM and eCommernce software. Try a 14-day trial, absolutely FREE.

similar_products.short_desc: Maximize your agents' efficiency with RingCentral's smart auto dialer to quickly connect customers with a live agent.
similar_products.features: Get a more efficient, effective contact center with RingCentral's auto dialer. Maximize your agent's productivity for a better customer experience, save money and time, and increase the likelihood of reaching successful leads.

similar_products.short_desc: Dial more prospects and close deals faster with better quality calls that give your sales reps the upper hand.
similar_products.features: Dial more prospects and close deals faster with better quality calls that give your sales reps the upper hand. Aircall's flexible sales dialer solution enables reps to dial multiple prospects automatically in a back-to-back queue, while surfacing crucial contact information directly in the phone interface. Join 6,000+ companies that trust Aircall to strengthen their sales outreach with first-class phone features like: CRM integrations, CTI, call coaching, call tagging, click-to-dial, and more.

similar_products.short_desc: Cloud-based power dialer. Reach up to 80 contacts per hour w/ NO awkward pause. No set up fees. Free trial (no credit card needed).
similar_products.features: Have More LIVE Conversations in 15-Minutes Guaranteed! We're so confident you'll boost outbound sales with our power dialer, you can use our full product for FREE without a credit card. Here's why we're confident: 1) Dial leads 4x faster 2) No awkward pauses after contact answers 3) Drop voicemails/emails in 1-click 4) Automate post call workflows 5) No special equipment needed. Powerful yet easy to use!

similar_products.short_desc: Our products include: Auto Dialer, Cloud Phone System, Progressive Dialer, CRM & Lead Management, and Email & SMS Marketing Automation.
similar_products.features: Ricochet360 is the All-in-One Auto Dialer, CRM/Lead Management, and Marketing Automation Platform that creates predictable revenue outcomes by automating 95% of your agents daily sales workflow. Designed for both inbound & outbound agents looking for a competitive advantage, Ricochet360 enables your team to call a new lead in less than one second, then automatically nurture and engage prospects throughout the entire sales process.

similar_products.short_desc: OnSolve One Call Now is a simple critical communications software for businesses to broadcast emergency alerts, send routine alerts.
similar_products.features: OnSolve's One Call Now, one of our market-leading critical communications products, enables groups and organizations of all sizes and types to quickly, securely and reliably distribute critical information to large numbers of people on virtually any device and network. OnSolve sends over two billion notifications annually and has provided more than 60 years of proven support to both the public and private sectors. We are in the business of helping our customers proactively keep people informed.

similar_products.short_desc: SpitFire Enterprise Call Center Software: Easy to Install, Operate & Upgrade. Agents can login for anywhere in the world on any device.
similar_products.features: What makes SpitFire different than other predictive dialers? SpitFire Enterprise is the only contact center software offering: Cloud, Premise or Hybrid call center solutions. 5 dialing modes: Predictive, Fixed Rate, Quick Connect, Preview & Manual Dialing options! Integrate your CRM or PBX or use the SpitFire API to fully customize your call center. OPC Marketing is all under one roof in Addison, Texas where we develop, we deliver and we support!

similar_products.short_desc: GoToConnect combines Jive's VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's video conferencing into one simple, reliable and flexible solution.
similar_products.features: GoToConnect (formerly Jive) combines cloud VoIP phone systems with GoToMeeting's web, audio and video capabilities into one simple, flexible solution. Users can meet, talk, and collaborate via web browser, desktop application, or desk phone with features ranging from virtual voicemail, and call forwarding, to secure video conferencing and screen sharing. For as low as $19.95 a month, GoToConnect eliminates the hassle and expense of managing multiple collaboration solution providers.

similar_products.short_desc: JustCall's Auto Dialer gives sales reps an upper hand by letting them dial more prospects seamlessly without worrying about call drops.
similar_products.features:
Trusted by 6000+ Customers Worldwide. JustCall's Auto Dialer minimizes time spent on manual dialing and frees up time to focus on your business. 
Upload contact lists and let software dial for you. Unlock your sales rep's potential with Auto-dialers.

Signup & get 70% discount for the first month

similar_products.short_desc: Dramatically increase contact and lead conversion rates with Convoso's omnichannel contact center software.
similar_products.features: Convoso's cloud-based, omnichannel predictive dialing software is the most complete solution on the market for outbound call centers with 20+ seats. Our industry-leading Answering Machine Detection rate - 97% accurate - coupled with our new Caller ID reputation management initiative means your agents will connect with real people - and not flagged as 'Scam Likely'. Factor in our intuitively automated workflows and see your contact rates increase by 3-4X when you switch to Convoso.

similar_products.short_desc: Send calls and/or text messages to a list of contacts within seconds. Used by churches, non-profits and many other businesses.
similar_products.features: Looking for an Auto Dialer with no setup or hidden fees?  DialMyCalls is your choice, come see why we're used by thousands of organizations.   Our Voice Broadcasting platform lets you easily call a group of numbers in minutes.  We also call throttling and push to connect campaigns to allow call recipients to easily press a key to be connected back to the phone number of your choice.   No hardware required, our platform handles everything for you.

similar_products.short_desc: Easy-to-use, full-featured Outbound Call Center Software from the cloud with many advanced features, but no set-up or monthly agent fee
similar_products.features: Powerful agent-based Autodialer with no limits on simultaneous calls and advanced configuration possibilities such as different dialer speeds, call modi, customisable call limitations or timezone awarenesss. Use Dialfire voice termination or BYO. Dialfire Dialer offers automation processes, statistics, reporting, easy customisable contact forms. No setup cost, no installation, no monthly cost. Simply pay as you go.

similar_products.short_desc: Call your leads and close more deals. Monitor the process of your leads through the sales process. Free 30-day trial account!
similar_products.features: Call Logic helps sales teams close more deals by streamlining their phone calling campaigns. With Call Logic, small businesses can multiply the number of outbound calls by over 3 times. This will ensure that their sales staff is working efficiently through their follow-up routine with clients and past cilents. Request a free demo or trial today and see how Call Logic can help you streamline your sales process while increasing productivity and employee performance!

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Appointment Reminder software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Appointment Reminder tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Appointment Reminder software helps reduce the number of missed appointments by automating customer notifications for appointment-based businesses.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Call Center software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Call Center tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Call Center software automates and standardizes the process of receiving and responding to customer phone calls. These solutions enable better monitoring of the customer experience, workflow management and evaluation of employee performance. Whether designed for virtual or site-based locations, Call Center applications manage and catalog the process of customer calls and often allow customers to track the progress of their request via the internet. Call Center software is related to Customer Service software and Help Desk software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Inside Sales software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Inside Sales tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Inside Sales software encompasses solutions that streamline the tasks involved in direct sales processes and includes a variety of power dialer applications, from predictive to progressive to voice messaging dialers. Inside Sales software boosts call volume, facilitates do-not-call compliance and allows sales agents to generate reports automatically, thus increasing sales team productivity. For related solutions see Sales Force Automation software and Predictive Dialer software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Predictive Dialer software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Predictive Dialer tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Predictive Dialer software automates matching and dialing of groups of telephone numbers for a variety of business or organizational purposes. Predictive dialers are frequently used in many types of out-bound call centers, as well as in some specific business applications such as lead management for sales or debt collection receivables. Predictive dialers feature sophisticated algorithms that enable the software to predict the viability of reaching a right party as well as routing that party to an available agent. Predictive Dialer software is related to Call Center software and Customer Service software as well as Debt Collection software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Telemarketing software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Telemarketing tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Telemarketing software automates customer outreach functions for sales and marketing call centers.

pricing_plans.name: Integrated
pricing_plans.description: The plan is billed annually and gives a 7-day free trial.

pricing_plans.name: Professional
pricing_plans.description: The plan is billed annaully and gives a 7-day free trial. It further includes all features from the integrated plan.

pricing_plans.name: Extended Trial
pricing_plans.description: The plan is billed annaully and gives a 7-day free trial. It further includes all features from the integrated and professional plans.
